subject: Technology
question_en: What is the primary function of Microsoft Word?
question_hi: Microsoft Word का मूल कार्य क्या है?
explanation_en: Microsoft Word is primarily used for creating and editing documents, while Microsoft Excel is used for managing data in spreadsheets and Microsoft PowerPoint is used for creating presentations.
explanation_hi: Microsoft Word डॉक्टर्स के लिए बनना और संपाठीवित करना मंत्रालय, Microsoft Excel डॉक्टरी के लिए डेटा संचालन मैन करना मंत्रालय, Microsoft PowerPoint के लिए प्रदेशन मैन करना
question_hi: Microsoft Word एपर्स, Microsoft Excel डॉक्टरी, Microsoft PowerPoint के लिए प्रदेशन मैन करना
explanation_hi: Microsoft Word एपर्स, Microsoft Excel डॉक्टरी, Microsoft PowerPoint के लिए प्रदेशन मैन करना
question_hi: MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint kaise प्रदेशन करना चाहिएगे
MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint की समझना

subject: Technology
question_en: Which of the following is used for creating presentations?
explanation_en: Microsoft PowerPoint is used for creating presentations.

subject: Technology
question_en: Which software is used for creating and editing documents?
explanation_en:
Microsoft Word is used for creating and editing documents.
Microsoft Excel is used for managing and analyzing data.
Microsoft PowerPoint is used for creating slideshows.
